Question: What are some of the accolades received by the movie 'Piku', released in 2015?
Options:
A. Best Film at the National Film Awards
B. Best Actor at the Oscars
C. Best Director at the Cannes Film Festival
D. Best Screenplay at the BAFTA Awards
Answer: Best Film at the National Film Awards

Options:
